case.title: Need a date/ arm candy?
case.text:
Beautiful, intelligent, adventurous, discreet, and fun-loving grad student looking to make some extra cash...
Have a date function and need, well, a date? Do you want to try something new and want someone to do it with? Maybe you just want some company one evening or a piece of arm candy to show off around town... I'm open to ideas!
If interested, tell me something about yourself! Legitimate inquiries will most definitely get pictures in return.
